author: Patrick Williams
method: Divide the whisky and brown sugar between two heatproof serving glasses. Pour the hot coffee into the glasses to come about 4cm/1Â½in from the top. Very carefully and steadily pour the cream over the back of a spoon to float on top of the coffee. Drink at once!
ingredients: 4 tbsp Irish whiskey,  25g/1oz brown sugar,  425ml/3/4pt fresh strong black coffee,  90ml/3fl oz double cream
